law.catch_line: Rates of exchange to be transmitted to Governor.
law.text: Each bank and each institution authorized to deal in bills of exchange shall, each month, transmit copies of its rates of exchange to the Governor for his information and for the information of the General Assembly.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2223.
